name: Invention Studio
description: Welcome to the hands-on build-it-yourself world of Invention Studio, the only interactive CD-ROM that turns you into a real inventor. Invention Studio is a gadget-filled, fully equipped, virtual testing ground and patent office. Construct real machines from a toaster to a robot, fire up power sources including wind and solar energy, create a blue print and watch your device come to life. In no time at all you will be researching, designing, building and testing out your own incredible inventions.
